So confused with this story. Where does this fit into the main storyline?
@Stingreal what about the LN how those it tie into this series?
PS: My explanation of events is how I saw it. You're entitled to you're own opinion on how it went down.

So yes, the author did lead us in with this story. I don't know where some guys get the info, but apparently he'll be releasing some more content for this tachibana story (can't confirm if rumours or not) if he does, I'm hoping (though doubting) for a "what if" scenario where the MC comes out on top and giving the ladies a "BEGONE THOT" when he finds someone better.
With the impregnation tag, I was hoping for the MC to knock up the mature woman but got given an angry doozy. But oh well.

Anymore questions to anyone who passed here, post them and I'll look into them two days later and try to answer. Don't get too depressed over it, the Main character didn't.

(at least this is what I get from his closing monologue) He is still hurt but doesn't show it, being as intimate and caring (or hugging the ladies etc) as before so they won't guess that he knows.

He goes to borrow some porn from a place and is told the fate of the rapists going to prison and that they released one more "wild" video, presumably of the three ladies though the MC thinks to himself that he'll never watch it or bother looking for it.

And that's the end.

In the original version, the ladies find that they've been knocked up and plan for a private abortion to hide the fact that they're pregnant from the MC. (Read the part almost at the end where the MC wakes up and hears voices from a room or something.)

From how the mature lady covers her face in the shower, she seems ashamed of letting the actions happen. (Doesn't help, whore!) To me, it also seems that she seems to regret not allowing sex with the MC since they came back from vacation as now he decides not to even touch them (even though one of them is giving him blowjobs to compensate)
Towards the end he finally seems to guess or actually know what happened (he's been borrowing porn and may have recognised the trio of ladies in one of them) but doesn't give a fuck, seeing using ladies as just sexual objects is shit but allowing such shit to happen to you (or like the ladies) while you say you love someone else is stupid.

Let me finally clear the air about this shit once and for all

First off, I'm into Ntr, but the kind of ntr and cheating where the MC is taking a woman cause her current man doesn't give a shit about her. Found this little piece a few years back and it still pisses me off. Hell! If I was an artist or had the cash I'd pay someone to make an alternate ending where the MC uses his brain to get the guys busted faster or beaten up and he disses the girls for being unfaithful whores......Sorry, had to rant.

That being said, the one you are currently reading, the one above, is a "what if" scenario. In this one, the guys are still fucking around with the whore girls (who can't seem to put up a fight worth shit, no matter their "Love" for the MC...sorry, rant again.)

In the original one (which now has a coloured and uncensored version on this site.) The guys are sent to jail, evidence being found that they've been raping and recording the rape of other women.
1/10 for a garbage

This is all, right? There is no redemption arc and anything? I am new to NTR and this shit really hit me hard. The novel just retells the story with some differences but the ending it's the same, the guy got cucked and that's it.

Ok so do who ever read this there are like 2 other versions that add on to the story in one of them it shows that the milf is talking to the police so she keeps visiting the rapist so they don't get suspicious in the other it talks about how the girls got pregnant and the mom looked for a safe place to get abortions for all of them herself included. Now most don't understand the ending, basically what happened is that the mom doesn't want to ruin her daughter's and lovers life by having those pictures and videos posted so she continues to go with the rapists, however unlike most NTR She's doesn't like the man neither do the sisters, the rapist's drugged her with aphrodisiacs and later on their bodies felt pleasure which is natural as sex mostly=pleasure if stimulated for long enough whether she likes to or not. So she went to the police after they got proof (sperm), they sent them to jail except the guys released like 4 vids before going. The guy finds out,the girlsadmit,forgives them
